capabilities.name: initialize_project
capabilities.description: Initializes a new Task Master project structure by calling the core initialization logic. Creates necessary folders and configuration files for Task Master in the current directory.

capabilities.name: models
capabilities.description: Get information about available AI models or set model configurations. Run without arguments to get the current model configuration and API key status for the selected model providers.

capabilities.name: parse_prd
capabilities.description: Parse a Product Requirements Document (PRD) text file to automatically generate initial tasks. Reinitializing the project is not necessary to run this tool. It is recommended to run parse-prd after initializing the project and creating/importing a prd.txt file in the project root's scripts/ directory.

capabilities.name: get_tasks
capabilities.description: Get all tasks from Task Master, optionally filtering by status and including subtasks.

capabilities.name: get_task
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific task

capabilities.name: next_task
capabilities.description: Find the next task to work on based on dependencies and status

capabilities.name: complexity_report
capabilities.description: Display the complexity analysis report in a readable format

capabilities.name: set_task_status
capabilities.description: Set the status of one or more tasks or subtasks.

capabilities.name: generate
capabilities.description: Generates individual task files in tasks/ directory based on tasks.json

capabilities.name: add_task
capabilities.description: Add a new task using AI

capabilities.name: add_subtask
capabilities.description: Add a subtask to an existing task

capabilities.name: update
capabilities.description: Update multiple upcoming tasks (with ID >= 'from' ID) based on new context or changes provided in the prompt. Use 'update_task' instead for a single specific task or 'update_subtask' for subtasks.

capabilities.name: update_task
capabilities.description: Updates a single task by ID with new information or context provided in the prompt.

capabilities.name: update_subtask
capabilities.description: Appends timestamped information to a specific subtask without replacing existing content

capabilities.name: remove_task
capabilities.description: Remove a task or subtask permanently from the tasks list

capabilities.name: remove_subtask
capabilities.description: Remove a subtask from its parent task

capabilities.name: clear_subtasks
capabilities.description: Clear subtasks from specified tasks

capabilities.name: analyze_project_complexity
capabilities.description: Analyze task complexity and generate expansion recommendations.

capabilities.name: expand_task
capabilities.description: Expand a task into subtasks for detailed implementation

capabilities.name: expand_all
capabilities.description: Expand all pending tasks into subtasks based on complexity or defaults

capabilities.name: add_dependency
capabilities.description: Add a dependency relationship between two tasks

capabilities.name: remove_dependency
capabilities.description: Remove a dependency from a task

capabilities.name: validate_dependencies
capabilities.description: Check tasks for dependency issues (like circular references or links to non-existent tasks) without making changes.

capabilities.name: fix_dependencies
capabilities.description: Fix invalid dependencies in tasks automatically
